name: Agent: Untouchable
description:
Theme: Untouchable

(You can't touch what you can't see >:3)

Play as Agent Untouchable, a swift-footed feline, in this museum based stealth game! Use your hacking skills and evasive manoevers to avoid the guards and make your way up to the top floor, where you have an important mission to complete.

Made over the course of a week for #PGDJam, a game jam hosted by Plymouth University's Game Dev Society.

Controls:

Z: Emote

X: Map

C: Interact

Space: Jump

Arrow keys: Movement

The Team:

Alex Pritchard 

Jack Brewer

Josie Wood
